text:
Robert F. Wagner,
Mayor
WNYC
WNYC-FM
Siegel
Director
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
NEW YORK 7, N. Y.
WHHehall 3-3600
May 28, 1956
Mr. Harry J. Skornia
NAEB Headquarters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Thank you for a copy of your memorandum to Schooley
of May 23rd. I would agree that you ought to get some kind of a
clearance from ETRC. At any event, please send me all necessary
reactions to TV entrance in the Prix Italia so that I can intelligently
obtain action which would be beneficial to us.
SNS/cb
RECEIVED
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
MAY 311956
